com.mumfrey.liteloader.transformers.event

Class MethodInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mumfrey.liteloader.transformers.event.MethodInfo

  • public class MethodInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulates a method descriptor with varying degrees of accuracy from a simpler owner/method mapping up to and including a multi-faceted notch/srg/mcp method descriptor which works in all obfuscation environments.
    Author:
    Adam Mummery-Smith

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String INFLECT 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MethodInfo(Obf owner)
      Create a MethodInfo for the specified class with a method name inflected by context
      MethodInfo(Obf owner, Obf method, java.lang.Object returnType, java.lang.Object... args)
      Create a MethodInfo for the specified class and method names and compute the descriptor using the supplied arguments, both the returnType and args values can be one of four types: + Obf instances - are converted to the appropriate class name for the obf type internally + Strings - are added directly to the descriptor + Type instances - are expanded to their bytecode literal + Class instances - are expanded to their bytecode descriptor via Type.getDescriptor
      MethodInfo(Obf owner, Obf method, java.lang.String descriptor)
      Create a MethodInfo for the specified class and method, with a literal descriptor
      MethodInfo(Obf owner, java.lang.String method)
      Create a MethodInfo for the specified class and literal method name
      MethodInfo(Obf owner, java.lang.String method, java.lang.Object returnType, java.lang.Object... args)
      Create a MethodInfo for the specified class and literal method and compute the descriptor using the supplied arguments, both the returnType and args values can be one of four types: + Obf instances - are converted to the appropriate class name for the obf type internally + Strings - are added directly to the descriptor + Type instances - are expanded to their bytecode literal + Class instances - are expanded to their bytecode descriptor via Type.getDescriptor
      MethodInfo(Obf owner, java.lang.String method, java.lang.String descriptor)
      Create a MethodInfo for the specified class, literal method name and literal descriptor
      MethodInfo(java.lang.String owner)
      Create a MethodInfo for the specified class with a method name inflected by context
      MethodInfo(java.lang.String owner, java.lang.String method)
      Create a MethodInfo for the specified class and method names (literal)
      MethodInfo(java.lang.String owner, java.lang.String method, java.lang.String descriptor)
      Create a MethodInfo for the specified literal class, literal method and literal descriptor

      Get the Searge name of the method (if it has one, otherwise returns the base name)
      java.lang.String getOrInflectName(java.lang.String context)
      Get the method name or inflects it using the supplied context if this MethodInfo was created with inflection enabled

      Get the method's owning class

      Get the method's owning class's obfuscated name (if it has one, otherwise returns the same as getOwner())

      Get all owner variants in an array

      • MethodInfo

        public MethodInfo(Obf owner,
                  java.lang.String method,
                  java.lang.String descriptor)
        Create a MethodInfo for the specified class, literal method name and literal descriptor
        Parameters:
        owner - Owner name descriptor
        method - Literal method name
        descriptor - Literal descriptor (useful for methods which only accept primitive types and therefore have a fixed descriptor)

      • MethodInfo

        public MethodInfo(java.lang.String owner,
                  java.lang.String method,
                  java.lang.String descriptor)
        Create a MethodInfo for the specified literal class, literal method and literal descriptor
        Parameters:
        owner - Literal class name
        method - Literal method name
        descriptor - Literal descriptor (useful for methods which only accept primitive types and therefore have a fixed descriptor)

      • MethodInfo

        public MethodInfo(Obf owner,
                  Obf method,
                  java.lang.String descriptor)
        Create a MethodInfo for the specified class and method, with a literal descriptor
        Parameters:
        owner - Owner class name descriptor
        method - Method name descriptor
        descriptor - Literal descriptor (useful for methods which only accept primitive types and therefore have a fixed descriptor)

      • MethodInfo

        public MethodInfo(Obf owner,
                  java.lang.String method,
                  java.lang.Object returnType,
                  java.lang.Object... args)
        Create a MethodInfo for the specified class and literal method and compute the descriptor using the supplied arguments, both the returnType and args values can be one of four types: + Obf instances - are converted to the appropriate class name for the obf type internally + Strings - are added directly to the descriptor + Type instances - are expanded to their bytecode literal + Class instances - are expanded to their bytecode descriptor via Type.getDescriptor
        Parameters:
        owner - Owner name descriptor
        method - Literal method name
        returnType - Return type for the method (use Void.TYPE for void methods)
        args - (optional) list of method arguments as Obf/String/Type/Class instances

      • MethodInfo

        public MethodInfo(Obf owner,
                  Obf method,
                  java.lang.Object returnType,
                  java.lang.Object... args)
        Create a MethodInfo for the specified class and method names and compute the descriptor using the supplied arguments, both the returnType and args values can be one of four types: + Obf instances - are converted to the appropriate class name for the obf type internally + Strings - are added directly to the descriptor + Type instances - are expanded to their bytecode literal + Class instances - are expanded to their bytecode descriptor via Type.getDescriptor
        Parameters:
        owner - Owner name descriptor
        method - Method name descriptor
        returnType - Return type for the method (use Void.TYPE for void methods)
        args - (optional) list of method arguments as Obf/String/Type/Class instances
